name: SnakeByte!
description:
Let's get ready to rumble! Snakebyte is a fast-pace Snake-like arcade game that will bring back couch-based multiplayer and make your friends scream 'BYTE ME!'. Collect the correct bits to score points and beat your enemies to bits. Or why not try your 'turn-based' skills in the puzzle mode? Plenty of bits for every snake.... or are there?

Interested in the roadmap and the development of the game? Take a look at the public Trello board right here!
